alert.note: Alert for Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 2:18PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Leon County through 245 PM EDT... At 217 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Florida A And M, or near Tallahassee. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida A And M, Florida State University, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Ralford Greenway, Macon Community Park, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Lake Munson, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Eight Mile Pond, Killearn Estates, Chaires, Lake Ella, Tallahassee Mall, State Capital Complex, Governors Square Mall and Springsax Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
